name: Floworks
description:
Welcome to Floworks!
Make your own flower garden with water drops.
Guide your water drop by just dragging the screen and make your screen bloom.

You score as you make flowers, so try to water more flowers. Also do not forget to share your fantastic creation with your friends!

*Absolutely beautiful and relaxing.
*Anyone can play with simple control - just drag the screen and let it go.
*This game is completely free!
*No persistent network connection is required to play.
